Visitor Management
Digital Gatekeeping. Replace paper logs with secure, digital visitor 
management. Our systems track entry and exit times, issue badges, 
and screen visitors against watchlists, ensuring that only authorized 
personnel gain access to your facility.
System Capabilities:
Pre-Registration: Allowing hosts to pre-approve guests via app or 
email for faster check-in.
Badge Printing: Instant creation of photo ID badges with access 
privileges encoded.
Audit Trails: Digital logs of every visitor movement for compliance 
and security audits.Surveillance
Intelligent Eyes Everywhere. Beyond simple recording, our surveillance 
solutions utilize AI-driven analytics. We provide proactive monitoring 
that detects anomalies, tracks movement, and provides real-time 
alerts.
Advanced Features:
Behavioral Analytics: Identifying suspicious loitering or unattended 
baggage automatically.
Night Vision & Thermal: Ensuring visibility in zero-light conditions or 
dense fog.
Remote Monitoring: Centralized command centers that watch 
over multiple sites simultaneously.Parking Management
Optimized Arrival. We transform parking from a hassle into a 
streamlined operation. Our management systems optimize space 
utilization, control vehicle access, and ensure the safety of vehicles.
Solutions:
Automated Boom Barriers: RFID-enabled entry for authorized 
employees.
Guidance Systems: Sensors and digital signage guiding drivers to 
the nearest empty slot.
Ticketless Entry: ANPR (Automatic Number Plate Recognition) for 
seamless access.Integrated Smart Traffic Management
Controlled Flow. For campuses and large complexes, internal traffic 
flow is a safety priority. We implement smart signaling and traffic 
marshaling protocols to prevent congestion.
Traffic Solutions:
Signage & Marking: Professional road marking and signage to 
designate lanes and pedestrian zones.
Speed Control: Installation of speed breakers and monitoring 
cameras to enforce campus speed limits.
Marshaling: Trained personnel to direct traffic during peak hours or 
shift changes.Incidence Response Mechanis m
Speed. Strategy. Resolution. When an alarm triggers, seconds count. 
Our automated incidence response mechanisms integrate sensors 
with communication channels, ensuring immediate mobilization.
Workflow:
Automated Alerts: Immediate SMS and email notifications to 
security heads upon sensor breach.
SOP Activation: Digital checklists for guards to follow during 
specific emergencies (fire, intrusion).
Post-Incident Reporting: Automated generation of incident reports 
for legal and insurance purposes.Perimeter Protectio n
The Iron Shield. We secure your boundaries using a blend of physical 
barriers and electronic intrusion detection systems. We ensure that 
your perimeter is impenetrable to unauthorized access.
L ayers of Defense:
PIDS (Perimeter Intrusion Detection Systems): Fiber optic sensors on 
fences that detect cutting or climbing attempts.
Electric Fencing: Non-lethal, deterrent high-voltage fencing for 
high-security zones.
Motion Sensors: Microwave and infrared beams creating an invisible 
wall around the property.Vendor Management
Secure Supply Chains. Security risks often enter through the back 
door. Our vendor management protocols vet external suppliers and 
contractors.
Process:
KY C & Vetting: Thorough background checks on all vendor 
personnel entering the premises.
Material Movement: Strict checking of goods in and goods out to 
prevent pilferage.
Access Z ones: Restricting vendor access only to loading docks and 
specific service areas.Access Contro l
Precision Entry. Control is the core of security. We implement 
biometric, card, and mobile-based access control systems that 
ensure the right people have access to the right areas at the right 
times.
Technologies:
Biometrics: Fingerprint and facial recognition for high-accuracy 
identification.
Mobile Credentials: U sing smartphones as k eys for convenient, 
touchless entry.
Anti-Passback: Preventing a single access card from being used by
